scripts.build:full: npm run build:api && npm run build
scripts.setup:full: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.db:init: cd backend && mysql -u root -p < scripts/001-create-database.sql && mysql -u root -p drizatx < scripts/002-seed-data.sql
scripts.docker:restart: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker compose build --no-cache && docker compose up -d
scripts.docker:db-shell: docker compose exec db mysql -udriza -pDrizaDB_2025 drizatx
